Statuses.name: Working as Expected
Statuses.description: The database is fully operational, with all features running smoothly and without any issues. No disruptions or delays are expected.

Statuses.name: Under Maintenance
Statuses.description: The database is currently undergoing scheduled maintenance to improve accuracy and stability. During this period, some features may be temporarily unavailable or display incorrect information.

Statuses.name: Degraded Performance
Statuses.description: The database is experiencing performance issues, which may result in slower response times and occasional delays. We are actively investigating and working to restore optimal performance.

Statuses.name: Partial Outage
Statuses.description: Certain parts of the database are currently unavailable, causing disruptions and incorrect information to be displayed. While some functionality remains operational, users may encounter intermittent issues.

Statuses.name: Offline
Statuses.description: The database is completely offline due to an unexpected issue or scheduled downtime. All features are currently inaccessible. We are actively working to resolve the problem as quickly as possible.
